Item.Name: AREA
Item.Label: C Agr
Item.Hint: Por Favor Digite El Código del Area a selecciona

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
If :control.area is not null then
Begin
 Select nom
 into :control.nomare
 from area_trab
 where c_emp=:global.empresa 
 and c_are=:control.area;
exception
 when no_data_found then
 :control.nomare:=' ';
 messagebox('Area No definida. Verifique');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then :system.message_level := 0;
End;
End If;

Item.Name: PER
Item.Label: N Cont
Item.Hint: Por Favor Digite el Número de la selección

Item.Name: SEQ
Item.Label: N Cont
Item.Hint: Por Favor Digite el Número de la selección

Item.Name: TIPO_CONT
Item.Label: N Cont
Item.Hint: Por Favor Digite el Número de la selección

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
Go_block ('PROC_SEL');

Clear_Block(No_validate);

Execute_Query (All_records);

If :proc_sel.estado = 'C' then
 messagebox('El proceso ya ha sido convertido al contrato: '||:proc_sel.n_cont ||
 ' NO puede ser modificado ');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 go_item('CONTROL.AREA');
elsif :proc_sel.estado = 'D' then
 messagebox('El proceso fue declarado desierto no puede ser modificado ');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 go_item('CONTROL.AREA');
else

 GO_ITEM('proc_sel.c_tip');
 :CONTROL.TIPO_CONT_MONTO := 'OS'; 
End If;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Go_Item ('PROC_SEL.fecha');
SALIR;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
GO_BLOCK('PROC_SEL_REQ');
IF :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_REQ IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGEBOX('El proceso no puede pasar a contrato hasta que no defina los requerimientos. Por favor complete el proceso de seleccion definiendo los requerimientos.');
 GO_ITEM('CONTROL.CXP_PROY');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText: Go_Item ('PROC_SEL.fecha');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PROC_SEL.N_IDE IS NOT NULL THEN 
 GO_BLOCK('PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ');
 LLENAR_REQ_PROV;
 IF :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.COD_REQ IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGEBOX('El proceso no puede pasar a contrato hasta que no defina los requerimientos para los proponentes. Por favor complete el proceso de seleccion definiendo los requerimientos para los proponentes.');
 GO_ITEM('CONTROL.CXP_PROY');
 END IF;
ELSE
 MESSAGEBOX('DEBE SELECCIONAR PRIMERO UN PROVEEDOR');
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText: Go_Item ('PROC_SEL.fecha');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin

 If To_char(:cont_cxp.f_ini,'YYYY')< :Cont_cxp.ano_oc then
 messagebox('La fecha de Inicio de Contrato no debe ser menor Que el ano de la Orden de compra');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If;
 :cont_cxp.tas:=tasacambio(:Global.Empresa,:cont_cxp.mon,:cont_cxp.f_ini);
 End;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:DIS_CONT_CXP.ccos := ''; 
 :DIS_CONT_CXP.nom_ccos := ''; 
 :DIS_CONT_CXP.Val_Dis := '';
 :DIS_CONT_CXP.Val_cos := '';

Block.Name: PROC_SEL
Block.WhereClause:
c_emp=:global.empresa and per = :control.per and seq = :control.seq and
tipo_cont = :control.tipo_cont

Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PROC_SEL.C_TIP IS NULL THEN
 LIST_VALUES;
ELSE
 NEXT_ITEM;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PROC_SEL.N_IDE IS NULL THEN
 LIST_VALUES;
ELSE
 GO_ITEM('proc_sel.tip_min');
END IF;

Relation.Name: PROC_SEL_PROC_SEL_REQ
Relation.JoinCondition:
PROC_SEL_REQ.C_EMP = PROC_SEL.C_EMP AND
PROC_SEL_REQ.PER = PROC_SEL.PER AND
PROC_SEL_REQ.SEQ = PROC_SEL.SEQ AND
PROC_SEL_REQ.TIPO_CONT = PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin
 Select nvl(nom,'Sin nombre area')
 into :proc_sel.nom_area
 from area_trab
 where c_emp=:global.empresa and c_are=:proc_sel.area;
exception
 when no_data_found then
 :proc_sel.nom_area:='Area No definida';
End;




If :proc_sel.cod_cat is not null then
 begin
 select nvl(descripcion,'Sin descripción categoría')
 into :proc_sel.NOM_catEGORIA
 from categoria_ppto
 where c_emp = :global.empresa
 and ano = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')
 and cod_cat = :proc_sel.cod_cat;
 exception when no_data_found then
 :proc_sel.NOM_CATEGORIA := 'Categoría sin definir';
 end;
End If;


If :proc_sel.tipo_cont is not null then
 begin
 select nvl(descripcion ,'Sin descripción tipo control')
 into :proc_sel.NOM_TIPO_CONTROL
 from tipo_control
 where c_emp = :global.empresa
 and tipo_cont = :proc_sel.tipo_cont
 and tipo_proc = :proc_sel.tipo_proc;
 exception when no_data_found then
 :proc_sel.NOM_TIPO_CONTROL := 'Sin descripción';
 end;
End If;

If :proc_sel.estado is not null then
 begin
 select decode(:proc_sel.estado,'P','En proceso de selección',
 'C','Convertido a contrato',
 'A','Anulado',
 'D','Desierto','Estado no definido')
 into :proc_sel.desc_estado
 from dual;
 end;
End If;
Begin
 If :proc_sel.n_ide is not null then
 :proc_sel.nom_proveedor := Trae_Nombre (:Global.Empresa, :proc_sel.n_ide);
 End if;
End;

If :proc_sel.c_tip is not null then
 Begin
 Select nom
 into :proc_sel.NOM_TIPO_CONTRATO
 From tipcont_cxp
 Where c_emp = :global.empresa
 And c_tip = :proc_sel.C_tip;
 Exception When No_data_found then
 :proc_sel.NOM_TIPO_CONTRATO := 'Sin descripción';
 End;
End If;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_REQ detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:PROC_SEL.C_EMP is not null) or (:PROC_SEL.PER is not null) or (:PROC_SEL.SEQ is not null) or (:PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('PROC_SEL.PROC_SEL_PROC_SEL_REQ'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PROC_SEL_REQ'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_REQ detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_REQ detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR PROC_SEL_REQ_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM proc_sel_req p 
 WHERE p.C_EMP = :PROC_SEL.C_EMP and p.PER = :PROC_SEL.PER and p.SEQ = :PROC_SEL.SEQ and p.TIPO_CONT = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_REQ detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_REQ detail program section
 --
 OPEN PROC_SEL_REQ_cur; 
 FETCH PROC_SEL_REQ_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( PROC_SEL_REQ_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('No puede borrar registro maestro cuando existen registros detalle coincidentes.'); 
 CLOSE PROC_SEL_REQ_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE PROC_SEL_REQ_cur;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_REQ detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin
 select estado,opcional,nom 
 into :proc_sel_req.estado,:proc_sel_req.opcional,:proc_sel_req.nom
 from greq_det
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and 
 COD_GREQ = :proc_sel_req.cod_greq and
 COD_REQ = :proc_sel_req.cod_req;
exception when others then 
 :proc_sel_req.estado := 'I';
End;

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
:cont_cxp.NRO_DIS := :proc_sel.dis;
:cont_cxp.per_dis := :proc_sel.per_dis;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin

 If To_char(:cont_cxp.f_ini,'YYYY')< :Cont_cxp.ano_oc then
 messagebox('La fecha de Inicio de Contrato no debe ser menor Que el ano de la Orden de compra');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If;
 :cont_cxp.tas:=tasacambio(:Global.Empresa,:cont_cxp.mon,:cont_cxp.f_ini);
 End;

Trigger.Name: PRE-TEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :dis_cont_cxp.periodo is null then
 :dis_cont_cxp.periodo := :control.bper;
:dis_cont_cxp.dis := :control.bdis;
end if;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin
 Select nom into :dis_cont_cxp.NOM_ccos
 From Ccost
 Where C_Emp = :global.empresa and
 C_Cos = :dis_cont_cxp.ccos; 
 Exception When no_data_found then
 :dis_cont_cxp.NOM_ccos := 'Sin descripción';
 end;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText: :dis_cont_cxp.nom_rub := trae_rubro(:global.empresa,:dis_cont_cxp.rubro);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin
 If :dis_cont_cxp.val_dis < :dis_cont_cxp.val_cos then
 messagebox('El valor del Centro de Costo es Mayor que el valor de la Disponibilidad');
 :dis_cont_cxp.val_cos := :dis_cont_cxp.val_dis ;
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If;
 
 If :dis_cont_cxp.val_cos <= 0 then
 messagebox('El valor del Centro de Costo tiene que ser mayor que cero');
 :dis_cont_cxp.val_cos := :dis_cont_cxp.val_dis ;
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If;
 End;

Trigger.TriggerText:

:dis_Cont_cxp.N_cont := :Cont_cxp.N_cont;

Trigger.TriggerText:
:dis_cont_cxp.periodo := :control.bper;
:dis_cont_cxp.dis := :control.bdis;

Trigger.Name: ON-ERROR
Trigger.TriggerText:
messagebox('Problemas al grabar la Disponibilidad');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin
 select estado, opcional 
 into :proc_sel_prop_req.estado, :proc_sel_prop_req.opcional
 from greq_det
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and 
 COD_GREQ = :proc_sel_req.cod_greq and
 COD_REQ = :proc_sel_req.cod_req;
 exception when others then :proc_sel_prop_req.estado := 'I';
End;

ProgramUnit.Name: REVISAREQ
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE revisareq IS
Begin
 go_block('proc_sel_req');
 first_record;
 loop
 
 if :proc_sel_req.estado = 'A' and :proc_sel_req.opcional = 'N' and
 nvl(:proc_sel_req.cumple,'N') = 'N' then
 messagebox('No se ha cumplido con uno de los requisitos del proceso de seleccion');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 end loop;
 
 go_block('proc_sel_prop_req');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :proc_sel_prop_req.estado = 'A' and :proc_sel_prop_req.opcional = 'N' and
 nvl(:proc_sel_prop_req.cumple,'N') = 'N' then
 messagebox('El proveedor no ha cumplido con todos los requisitos');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 end loop;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDACION
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE VALIDACION IS
minsmlv number(18,4);
maxsmlv number(18,4);
valor_contr number(14,2);
valorsmlv number(14,2);
salminimo number(14,2);
anoactual number(4);
BEGIN
 

 ---Validacion de contratos de Orden de Compra y Orden de Servicio
 ---no puedan hacerse por mas de 50 smlv 
 --busco el salario minimo 
 select to_char(sysdate,'YYYY') 
 into anoactual
 from dual;
 
 begin 
 select sal_min 
 into salminimo
 from var
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 ano = anoactual;
 end;

 ---Busco monto del contrato 
 begin
 select monto
 into valor_contr 
 from proc_sel 
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 --n_ide = :proc_sel.n_ide and
 area = :proc_sel.area and
 per = :proc_sel.per and 
 tipo_cont = 'CSFP' AND
 seq = :proc_sel.seq ;
 valorsmlv := nvl(valor_contr,0) / nvl(salminimo,0); 
 valorsmlv := round(valorsmlv,1); 
 -- messagebox('Monto '||:global.monto);
 exception
 when no_data_found then 
 messagebox('El contrato no tiene Monto definalo');
 when too_many_rows then 
 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end;
--busco el smlv para 'OS' orden de Servicio y 'OC' Orden de Compra 

 begin 
 select vlr_fin 
 into maxsmlv
 from req_categoria 
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and 
 tipo_cont = 'CSFP' and 
 tipo_proc = 'S' ;
 exception 
 when no_data_found then 
 messagebox('Falta parametros de categoria');
 when too_many_rows then 
 messagebox('tipo de control duplicado'); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end; 
 
 if nvl(valorsmlv,0) > nvl(maxsmlv,0) then 
 messagebox('El valor del los contrato por Orden de Compra u Orden de Servicios no pueden exceder el valor de 50 smlv '||valor_contr);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 /* begin
 select maximo_smlv
 into maxsmlv 
 from proy_cxp 
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and 
 est = 'A' and
 c_proy = 'OS' ;
 exception
 when no_data_found then 
 messagebox('Debe clasificar el contrato como orden de Servicio');
 when too_many_rows then 
 messagebox('Claisificacion de Contrato Duplicado. Revise');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end; 
 begin
 select maximo_smlv
 into maxsmlv 
 from proy_cxp 
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and 
 est = 'A' and
 c_proy = 'OC';
 exception
 when no_data_found then 
 messagebox('Debe clasificar el contrato como orden de Compra');
 when too_many_rows then 
 messagebox('Claisificacion de Contrato Duplicado. Revise');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end;
 
 if nvl(valorsmlv,0) > nvl(maxsmlv,0) then 
 messagebox('El valor del los contrato por Orden de Compra o Orden de Servicios no pueden exceder el valor de 50 smlv '||valor_contr);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; */
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SALIR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE salir IS
res number;
BEGIN
 Res := 0;
 If (:System.form_status = 'CHANGED') Then
 Res := Preguntar ('La Forma Tiene Datos Sin Grabar. Desea Almacenarlos Ahora?');
 End If;
 If (Res = 1) Then
 Grabar;
 End If;
 Exit_form(no_validate);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: LIMPIAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE limpiar IS
res number;
BEGIN 
 Res := 1;
 If (:System.form_status = 'CHANGED' Or :System.form_status = 'NEW') Then
 Res := Preguntar ('La Forma Tiene Datos Sin Grabar. Desea Blanquear?');
 End If;
 If (Res = 1) Then
 Clear_Form (No_Validate); 
 Inicio; 
 End If;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: INICIO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE INICIO IS
BEGIN 
 Set_Window_Property ('WINDOW0', WINDOW_STATE, MAXIMIZE);
 Execute_Trigger('INIT');
 BUSCAR; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: IMPRIMIR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE IMPRIMIR IS
 list_id ParamList;
BEGIN
 null;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: GRABAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE grabar IS
consec consec_rps.num%type;
Res Number;
Cerr Number;
Merr Varchar2(200);
ErrorFound Exception;
Resp Number;
Periodo PROC_SEL.PER%TYPE;

Begin 
 :CONT_CXP.C_EMP := :GLOBAL.EMPRESA; 
 :CONT_CXP.USR := :GLOBAL.USUARIO_SP6; 
 :CONT_CXP.N_CONT := :PROC_SEL.N_CONT; 
 :CONT_CXP.N_IDE := :PROC_SEL.N_IDE;
 :CONT_CXP.tip_min := :PROC_SEL.tip_min; 
 :CONT_CXP.MON := 'PESO';
 :CONT_CXP.TAS := 1;
 :CONT_CXP.MONTO := :PROC_SEL.MONTO;
 :CONT_CXP.OBJETO := :PROC_SEL.OBJETO; 
 :CONT_CXP.C_TIP := :PROC_SEL.C_TIP;
 :CONT_CXP.EST := 'G';
 :CONT_CXP.OTROSI := 'N';
 :CONT_CXP.RET_GAR := 'N'; 
 :CONT_CXP.PER := :PROC_SEL.PER; 
 :CONT_CXP.ANO := substr(periodo,1,4); 
 :CONT_CXP.CSC := consec; 
 
-- messagebox(':CONT_CXP.TIPO_CDP 1 '||:PROC_SEL.TIPO_CDP);
 --SI NO HA SELECCIONADO UN PROPONENTE NO PUEDE REALIAZR EL CONTRATO
 If Nvl (:PROC_SEL.Monto, 0) <> Nvl (:DIS_CONT_CXP.suma_Dis, 0) Then
 MessageBox ('Monto del Contrato no es igual al total Disponibilidad');
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 End If;
 If :proc_sel.n_ide is null then
 messagebox('Indique contratista a adjudicar');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end If;
 
 If :proc_sel.tip_min is null then
 messagebox('Indique el tipo de Minuta');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end If;
 
 
 
 --SE OBTIENE EL PERIODO PARA COLOCARLO EN LA FECHA DE FIRMA DEL PERIODOD Y EN CONT_CXP
 SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')
 INTO Periodo
 FROM DUAL; 
 

 
 LLENAR_REQ_PROV;
 REVISAREQ;
 
 -- SI ES UNA ORDEN DE SERVICIO VALIDO LA CANTIDAD DE SALARIOS DEL CONTRATO
 /*if :control.tipo_cont_monto = 'OS' or :control.tipo_cont_monto = 'OC' then 
 VALIDACION;
 end if; */
 
 --********************************** TIPOS ESPECIALES DE CTO ********************************
 
 --SI NO SE HA GENERADO EL NUMERO DE CONTRATO LO GENERO
 
 If :proc_sel.n_cont is null THEN 
 Numeracion.Csc (:Global.Empresa, Periodo,'CONTRATO', consec, CErr, MErr);
 :PROC_SEL.n_cont:= substr(periodo,1,4)||'-'||:PROC_SEL.C_TIP||'-'||consec ;
 :CONT_CXP.cont_conf_sinf:='SF'; 
 If CErr != 0 Then
 MsgErr (CErr, MErr);
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End if;
 End If; 
 BEGIN
 SELECT min(C_AGE)
 into :CONT_CXP.C_AGR
 from AGENCIA
 where C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA;
 EXCEPTION WHEN no_data_found THEN
 messagebox('No existen agencias. Debe crear por lo menos una agencia');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END; 
 
 :PROC_SEL.F_CREA_CONT := SYSDATE;
 :PROC_SEL.ESTADO := 'C';
 
 BEGIN
 
 Begin
 select tcontratacion
 into :cont_cxp.tcontratacion
 from tipo_control
 where c_emp = :global.empresa
 and tipo_cont = :proc_sel.tipo_cont
 and tipo_proc = :proc_sel.tipo_proc;
 exception when no_data_found then null;
 End; 
 
 :CONT_CXP.TIPO_CDP := :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CDP;
 :CONT_CXP.TIENE_LIQ := 'N';
 END;


 Commit_Form;
 
 If Form_success Then
 Messagebox('Se ha actualizado el contratista en la selección '||:proc_sel.seq||' '||:proc_sel.per);
 MESSAGEBOX('Se ha generado el contrato Nro. '||:PROC_SEL.N_CONT);
 :system.message_level:=25;
 Limpiar;
 else
 Messagebox('Problemas con la actualizacion del contrato ');
 End If;
 :system.message_level:=5;
Exception When ErrorFound Then
 Messagebox(SqlErrM);
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: BUSCAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE buscar IS
BEGIN
 GO_BLOCK('CONTROL');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 go_item('control.area');
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: BORRAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE borrar IS
res number;
BEGIN
 Res := Preguntar('Desea Eliminar Este Registro?');
 If Res = 1 Then
 GO_BLOCK(:TOOLBAR.NOMBRE_BLOQUE); 
 Delete_record; 
 End If;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: LLENAR_REQ_PROV
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE LLENAR_REQ_PROV IS
 CURSOR C1 IS 
 SELECT COD_REQ,ORDEN,CUMPLE,FECHA,NUM_DCTO,OBSERVACION 
 FROM PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA AND N_IDE = :PROC_SEL.N_IDE
 AND SEQ = :PROC_SEL.SEQ AND PER = :PROC_SEL.PER
 AND TIPO_CONT = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT
 ORDER BY ORDEN;

BEGIN 
 GO_BLOCK('PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 FOR A IN C1 LOOP
 :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.COD_REQ := A.COD_REQ;
 :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.ORDEN := A.ORDEN;
 :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.CUMPLE := A.CUMPLE;
 :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.FECHA := A.FECHA;
 :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.NUM_DCTO := A.NUM_DCTO;
 :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.OBSERVACION := A.OBSERVACION;
 CREATE_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 DELETE_RECORD;
END;

RecordGroup.Name: SELECCIONES
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT PER,SEQ,tipo_cont
FROM PROC_SEL
WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND AREA = :CONTROL.AREA
 AND ESTADO = 'P'
order by 1,3,2

RecordGroup.Name: PROVEED
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select n_ide,nom,VLR_PROP
 from proc_sel_prop
where c_emp = :global.empresa
 and per = :proc_sel.per
 and seq = :proc_sel.seq
 and tipo_cont = :proc_sel.tipo_cont
order by n_ide

RecordGroup.Name: TIP
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select * from TIPO_CONTRATO order by tipo

RecordGroup.Name: LOV97
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select obs, periodo, dis, nvl(tot_dis,0) tot_dis,fec_exp
from dispptal_enc 
where c_emp =:global.empresa and periodo = :DIS_CONT_CXP.periodo and estado in ('A','L') and tip_d != 'GD' 
order by dis

RecordGroup.Name: LOV108
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT PERIODO PERIODO
FROM DISPPTAL_ENC 
WHERE C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
AND ESTADO='A'
ORDER BY PERIODO DESC

RecordGroup.Name: LOV115
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select a.c_cos,a.rubro,trae_rubro('01',a.rubro) nom_rubro,b.nom,a.valor_dis dis1,a.valor_dis dis2
from dispptal_det a,ccost b where 
a.c_emp =:global.empresa and
a.dis =:DIS_CONT_CXP.dis and
a.periodo =:DIS_CONT_CXP.periodo and
a.c_emp=b.c_emp and
a.C_COS=b.C_COS

RecordGroup.Name: LOV148
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT PERIODO PERIODO
FROM DISPPTAL_ENC 
WHERE C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
AND ESTADO='A'
ORDER BY PERIODO DESC

RecordGroup.Name: LOV151
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select obs, periodo, dis, nvl(tot_dis,0) tot_dis,fec_exp
from dispptal_enc 
where c_emp =:global.empresa and periodo = :control.bper and estado in ('A','L') and tip_d != 'GD' 
order by dis

Trigger.Name: INIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 Empresa Parametros.Emp%Type;
 LogoPath Varchar2 (200);
Begin
 --
 -- Maximiza la ventana inicial
 --
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL:=20;
 Set_Window_Property ('WINDOW0', Window_State, Maximize);
 
 --
 -- Selecciona el nombre de la empresa
 --
 :TOOLBAR.c_emp := :GLOBAL.empresa;
 Begin
 Select Emp, logo Into Empresa, :toolbar.nombre_logo
 From Parametros
 Where C_Emp = :TOOLBAR.c_emp;
 Exception
 When no_data_found Then
 --
 -- Si la empresa no está definida se sale de la forma
 --
 MessageBox ('Empresa '||:TOOLBAR.c_emp||' no está definida.');
 Exit_Form (No_Validate); 
 End;
 --
 -- Despliega el nombre de la empresa en una o dos líneas
 -- dependiendo de la longitud del nombre
 --
 :Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1 := Empresa;
 :Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2 := Empresa;
 If (NVL(Length (:Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1), 0) > 30) Then
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2', Displayed, Property_True);
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1', Displayed, Property_False);
 Else
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2', Displayed, property_False);
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1', Displayed, property_True);
 End If;
 --
 -- Despliega el logo de la empresa
 --
 execute_trigger('lee_imagenes');

 --
 -- Llama al procedimiento de inicio particular de cada forma
 --
 Default_Value ('***', 'global.audsid'); 
 Begin
 Select machine Into Empresa
 From v$usr_sess
 Where audsid = :Global.audsid;
 Exception
 When others Then
 Exit_Form (No_Validate);
 Null;
 End;
End;

Trigger.Name: ON-CLEAR-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 Clear_All_Master_Details;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
